reviewText: Love this movie, One of the first films where I saw people that looked like me. I am so glad its long awaited journey to DVD has finally ended.
This is a very good non-conventional Love Story !!  Loved the sense of community between the cast members.  Lots of heart with humor at the same time.  A Must See.
Awesome movie!

Good movie. However, VERY VERY poor video quality. It looks as if someone took a cam bootlegged copy, wrapped and packaged it to make it look all nice and pretty and are now selling it.  On the side of the the DVD case its says "Promotional Copy".  It leads you to think that the DVD came directly form the studio, distributor or that maybe its a DVD screener,  but its not.  Its a "cam" copy of the movie.
Good  movie for the time 2000 - ish,  Somewhat fuzzy.
DVD continued to freeze, unable to play.  Waste of time and money.
One of Patrik Ian-Polk's clever creations. Punks is an entertaining about a character named Marcus, who is on a quest to finding himself and love in the gay culture.
want this movie for some years it was ok really low budget
The quality of the copy is bad since it's a promotional copy.  Hard to see, very dark.
One of my favorite movies of all time. Worth every penny
I DVD was purchased as a gift.
It was bday gift !
This seems to be a bootleg poorly made digital copy of a promotional copy.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this movie, I HAAAAAAAAAATE the DVD quality!!!!
It sucked but I endured through it.
I waited all these years for it to be on DVD, NOW I have to wait again
For when whomever put to DVD, will do it justice CORRECTLY.
I hate BOOTLEG quality DVDS but ...IT IS WHAT IT IS
I have been waiting for this movie to come out on DVD for a while. it is a promotional copy and the quality is substandard but I am still happy to have it in my collection.
love it
Great
Good but poor quality.
Very Dark Not A Good Video
Very Good Movie!
Love this movie and glad to FINALLY own it!!

Heard about this movie and always wanted to watch. Seen it was on Amazon and I must say what a great movie I watched several time and enjoy it as if it was 2001. Kinda reminds me of Noah's Arc just a little older but over all a great movie.

Only took the one star off due to this release being a Promotional Copy & the degraded Image Quality & really tight letter-box size WAS a tad distracting.  Which is REALLY a SHAME, because this is a truly a PIONEERING Film for American Black Same Gender Loving Males, for it's time.  This TRULY deserves a PROPER re-mastered Blu-ray Release.
Promo copy
The copy quality isn't the greatest.  Wish it was lighter
it was good. the movie picture was very dark and hard to see
very good
I love this movie
Not what I hoped for...

I love this movie-- the quality of film is not that great. However, given the fact that it's only a promotional DVD and the movie came out so long ago, (self produced by the director) it can be forgiven.
Fabulous Movie, Music and Great Cast. Really enjoyed it!

This movie is a "classic" in the fact that it was the first of its kind to tell the story of gay black men during a time when white men were the face of gay culture. It is the precursor of the groundbreaking gay television series, Noah's Arc. This movie's importance in the telling of a part of human history cannot be overstated.
I love this movie...watched it over several times. Rockmond Dunbar was excellent.
It's the movie but the video and audit weren't  very good.  I still love this movie.

The writer is so gifted. I liked its substance and the characters were brilliant in conveying the specific roles. Hilariously funny, the message is of love is conveyed well - where you don't always get what you want, but sometimes a trick of fate happens when we least expect it. The story line has relevance and periodicity in the gay culture. Cast really complimented each other quite well. Moreover, it is nice to see a race that is so misrepresented and misunderstood portrayed in a volatile way, beyond the hustler who is just looking for only a one night stand; rather, love is the optimal objective.
The movie is great from a material point of view. The film quality of the DVD could have been better. But definitely a worthwhile buy!
If you like Noah's Arc, then you will like this movie. I enjoyed this movie and I recommend that you purchase it.
Nothing much to say apart from...Love it, love it...love it!!! Truly entertaining and inspiring film. So glad it's on DVD!
I enjoy the movie PUNKS  when i saw if first on Cable, enjoy all the actors and a fan of Rockmond Dunbar

As his first film, Ian-Polk does an accurate and sympathetic portrayal of four black gays
confronting the conflicts and challenges of being gay.
I was not aware this was a promo copy. So that was really disappointing. It needs digital remastering in the worst way. The movie is really good. I LOVE Seth Gilliam.
The things I love most about Patrik's projects are his ability to create likeable characters, tell a great story, build a charming chemistry among the cast and make you so hungry for more...KUDOS
I love this movie and I am so glad that I was able to get it on DVD, a must watch!!!!
Patrik-Ian Polk you came a long way! Brother, and I hope you keep moving a long. Love the music on this DVD.
Cute storyline. Liked the cast especially Rockmond Dunbar & Seth Gilliam ( they had great chemistry). Nice initial film by Patrik-Ian Polk
Great film when it was released. I've waited over 10 yrs for it to be placed on dvd. Finally here.

Loved the romance that develops between two of the guys.  Also got into the characters.  Nothing against femme guys, but all of the movies I've seen from this director/producer are mostly about femme guys.  That seems to feed into the stereotype that gay men aren't masculine. Would love to see a romance between two black guys where both are masculine guys.
This movie is everything  and love it...please make a part two.. It would mean the world to me and a lot of people
Recorded poorly.  It needs "digital remastering" if possible and a free re-release to those of us who say this crazy little movie which launched Noah's Arc the tv series and it's tag on movie.

Love the movie, was excited to see it finally came out on DVD after all these years.  However was not so enthusiastic about the quality of the DVD itself.  It resembles the bootleg movies of yesteryears.

Excellent movie though.  I can't get enough of it.

i saw this back in 2000 at the cleveland ohio film festival then patrik gave a q & a after yeap i asked about the soundtrack then got his autograph & ticket stubs which i still have,i luved this movie wishing i'd find someone like darby omg well i got my dvd copy big ups to mr.polk shoutouts from akron ohio.
funny and great movie!!!! wish it was still instock
This copy was not a good copy
Great movie.

This was the first film of Patrik-Ian Polk that i saw. I was drawn to it because of the subject matter and the involvement of Kenneth "Babyface & Tracey Edmonds. I have tried to keep up with his movies, the most resent being "Blackbird". The picture quality could have been a little better, but over all, it does not take away from my enjoy of this film.
wonderful

This being Patrik-Ian Polk's first movie, I would say it was nicely done.  There are no subtitles nor any other flashy enhancements.  What you see is what you get.  I do like that it had romance, comedy, a dash of drama and healthy relationships between friends.  Seeing Ms. Loretta Devine in this movie was a pleasant surprise.  The movie doesn't have a dark and gloomy ending either.  I hope others give this movie a chance.
This is a great movie. So glad I ordered it.  Very entertaining.
I saw the film years ago and really enjoyed it. I was so excited to see that Amazon was carrying it. It is some promotional copy and the picture quality is grainy and pretty disappointing.
This was a horrible copy of the movie
Hands down classic.
